body:
Is there a rationale for why it's desirable to replace the +0.0 key with -0.0 in that case?

For what it's worth, I just tested C++, Python, and Java, and their standard map types all seem to prefer preserving preexisting key values (including for the -0.0 and +0.0 case, except for Java because its boxed Double type [treats -0.0 and +0.0 as unequal](http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/lang/Double.html#equals\(java.lang.Object\))).
